item.title: Hugo Quickstart
item.description: Build Your First Hugo Site In this tutorial, you’ll learn how to set up and build a Hugo site from scratch using the Ananke theme. Hugo is a fast, open-source static site generator. Prerequisites Before you begin, ensure that you have the following tools installed on your machine: Git - Install Git. Hugo - Install Hugo. brew install hugo You can verify the installation by running the following commands in your terminal:

item.title: Knowledge Sharing
item.description: Introduction to Static Site Generators: A Beginner’s Guide Welcome to the world of Static Site Generators (SSGs)! If you’re looking to build a website and have heard about SSGs but aren’t quite sure what they are or how they work, you’ve come to the right place. In this tutorial, we’ll walk you through the basics of SSGs, why they’re useful, and how to get started with one. Introduction to Static Site Generators: A Beginner’s Guide What is a Static Site Generator?
